alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 12 at 9:26PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central North Carolina, including the following counties, Davidson, Forsyth and Guilford. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 926 PM EDT, Automated gauges indicated flooding from the heavier rain that ended earlier. Flooding of small streams and creeks is occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greensboro, High Point, McLeansville, Summerfield, Pleasant Garden, Jamestown, Lake Jeanette Marina, Lake Brandt, Lake Townsend, Forest Oaks, Lake Townsend Marina, Oak Hollow Marina and Monticello. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
